Labels.WelcomeToUseBL:
Welcome to Bloret Minecraft Launcher.
If you find any bugs or have suggestions, please submit an issue on Github
You are also welcome to pull a request on the Github page to contribute to the Bloret Launcher.

BL_download_version.TitleLabel: Bloret Launcher - Minecraft Core Download and Installation

BL_download.TitleLabel: Bloret Launcher - Minecraft Core Download and Installation

Labels.CaptionLabel: The size data on the right is an early estimate and may not be actual data. It may be smaller or larger.

Labels.CaptionLabel_12:
Using IPV6 for online play, you can play with others without opening Bloret Launcher.
IPV6 is a free service provided by your operator, no additional charge. Users who already have it can click the button above to use it directly.
IPV6 online play may not be stable, if you pursue stability, it is recommended to use the Online Client below for online play.
Labels.CaptionLabel_9:
Online Client is an open source project of Bloret that can provide you with efficient online services.
Start the online service here, and the other party can participate in online play without installing Bloret Launcher.
Labels.CaptionLabel_6: Online Service Powered by Online Client (BloretCrew) , Server PCFS  Â© 2025 Bloret All rights reserved.

Labels.label: We are already loading...
Labels.label_4:
This may take some time, please be patient
Once loading is complete, we will immediately display options
We load through BMCLAPI used by most launchers
Therefore, loading speed depends on BMCLAPI loading speed and your network
If loading takes a long time or does not respond, please check the network. If the network is good, it may be a BMCLAPI issue

Labels.CaptionLabel_3:
Bloret Launcher core is independently developed by Bloret, but has fewer options
CMCL core can provide more versions
Labels.CaptionLabel_2: Warning: Bloret Launcher core is an experimental feature
Labels.Fabric_text_5:
Available when using Bloret Launcher core.
If download speed is too slow or fails, try switching download sources.
Labels.CaptionLabel_4:
Bloret Launcher core uses Light Minecraft protocol
Temporarily only supports downloading versions supported by Bloret.
To download other versions, please select CMCL core above.
Labels.vername_text: What do you want to call this newly downloaded version?
Labels.Fabric_text:
Select the Fabric mod loader, with it,
you will be able to install your own Mods to expand more Minecraft features
Please note that Bloret servers do not support server-side Mods,
You can only add client-side Mods
Bloret servers using Forge may have issues.
Labels.CaptionLabel:
It is recommended to select the latest version at the top of the list
Using previous versions may cause instability
Labels.StrongBodyLabel_8: Notify me through Windows notifications when download is complete
Labels.Fabric_text_6: Modrinth modpack format (.mrpack) is a simple format that allows you to store modpacks.
Labels.Fabric_text_3: Bloret Launcher does not necessarily launch Minecraft, it can launch more. (May require restarting the program to take effect)
Labels.Fabric_text_2: Select the program you want to customize for launch
Labels.Fabric_text_4: Set the name of this application displayed in the Bloret launcher

Labels.CaptionLabel_12: One-click download and install Vanilla Minecraft
Labels.CaptionLabel_13: Minecraft version that can add Mods
Labels.CaptionLabel_16:
Page for previous Bloret Launcher installation versions
You can go here to install other versions

Labels.StrongBodyLabel_4: Bloret Launcher has encountered some minor issues...
Labels.CaptionLabel_5: If you think this is a Bloret Launcher issue, please submit this issue.

Labels.CaptionLabel_3: Bloret Launcher is not just a Minecraft launcher, but also provides convenient game launch and management experience for Minecraft players.
Labels.CaptionLabel_2: Â© 2025 Bloret Launcher All rights reserved. Â© 2025 Bloret All rights reserved.

Labels.StrongBodyLabel_16: Get Version List and Version Details
Labels.CaptionLabel: Minecraft download source provided by bangbang93 / BMCLAPI

Labels.CaptionLabel_5: Modrinth provides tens of millions of Mods for you to choose from

Labels.label: Current Login Method:
Labels.CaptionLabel_2: When entering Bloret with Bloret Pass, you don't need to enter your password again.

Labels.CaptionLabel_3: Remember to click Set, otherwise changes will not take effect
Labels.CaptionLabel_2: More account management will be added in the future, such as Bloret Pass and Microsoft Login.

Labels.CaptionLabel_3: Remember to click Set, otherwise changes will not take effect
Labels.CaptionLabel_5: Using Bloret Pass, you can enjoy almost all Bloret services.

Labels.CaptionLabel_12:
Maximum number of files allowed to download simultaneously when downloading files
The larger the number, the faster the download speed, but it will occupy more computer performance.
Labels.CaptionLabel_5: Default window size at startup (takes effect after restarting the program)
Labels.CaptionLabel_11: Open Bloret Launcher at boot and minimize to system tray
Labels.CaptionLabel_6: Prevent Bloret Launcher from filling your computer
Labels.CaptionLabel_7: Show what the software is doing in the form of notifications before the software opens
Labels.StrongBodyLabel_21: Show Minecraft Account Login Method on Home Page
Labels.CaptionLabel_10: Show whether you are Microsoft login or offline login
Labels.CaptionLabel_8: Do not connect to part of the internet, do not allow use of PCFS services.
Labels.CaptionLabel_9: Most content of the settings interface requires restarting the program to take effect.
